citation_details.title: A practical workflow for organizing clinical intraoperative and long-term iEEG data in BIDS

citation_details.abstract: The neuroscience community increasingly uses the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) to  organize data, extending from MRI to electrophysiology data. While automated tools and
